group_1.textRight: Ugh...gh...

group_1.textLeft: Huff...ngh...huff...

group_1.textRight: Iroha Tamaki...
That vague hope you hold onto will trap you@and leave you stuck.
Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno...

group_1.textRight: I'll take it from here...
I don't have to hold back against someone@that doesn't even understand human emotions...
It's a shame I can't teach you with my fists...!

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno...
Tsuruno, I understand how you feel, but calm down.
There's no need to fight anymore.

group_1.textRight: It can't be!
The labyrinth's pattern disappeared...!?

group_1.textLeft: It looks like the offshoot Mirrors has been defeated...

group_1.textRight: Kh...

group_1.textLeft: We really did it...?

group_1.textRight: We were sent away by the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s labyrinth...

group_1.textLeft: Then, who could've...?

group_1.textRight: One of yours...

group_1.textLeft: Ikumi...!

group_1.textRight: In exchange for getting rid of the Witch,@the least you could do is gimme this.

group_1.textLeft: Stop it...@Give back that braceleeet!
[surround:1024A05][chara:300300:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Gh...

group_1.textRight: Juri the Great's tellin' ya you oughta go cool off.
Here, Sis.

group_1.textCenter: A price has been paid, but perhaps this result@is reasonable enough.

group_1.textRight: Including Big Sis's, that's four in total.@We're halfway there～
*Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: Wha...?

group_1.textRight: Did that just flash the moment ya got close...?
Is this [textYellow:Kimochi] stone reacting to the others?
What's wrong, Ui?
You hearin' the voices of those [textYellow:Kimochi] again...?

group_1.textLeft: No...not a voice...
When the four stones came together...@I could feel what the [textYellow:Kimochi] were thinking...
I can feel it...@What they've been doing to us...

group_1.textRight: Mokyuu...

group_1.textLeft: userName also seems to be sensing something...

group_1.textCenter: I can feel their intentions as well...@These things really are Witches after all...

group_1.textRight: Mokyu...mokyuu!

group_1.textLeft: Ui, can you tell us what the [textYellow:Kimochi] are thinking?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah.

group_1.narration: Return to Eve…@If all eight [textYellow:Kimochi] become one,@we will finally merge with the@Automatic Purification System@and return to Eve.
And since it would be inconvenient@to have powerful Magical Girls around@when we return to Eve...

We went through the trouble of choosing@twelve of the strongest Magical Girls@to have them kill one another...@We lend them our power@so we can find openings in their hearts@and corrode them from the inside...

group_1.textLeft: So we've been tricked!?

group_1.textRight: There was no point in collecting the [textYellow:Kimochi] stones,@was there...?

group_1.textLeft: I had my doubts about them, but they totally@manipulated us...

group_1.textRight: That means we've been helping to create Eve...

group_1.textLeft: This whole time, we've...
...Yuna, could we stop now...?
We've been cutting our own lives to create@a powerful Witch...
The [textYellow:Kimochi] have been toying with us...@Isn't all of this fruitless...?

group_1.textRight: Heh, from your point of view it is fruitless,
but despite learning the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s intentions,
you don't understand the sensation@of holding these stones, do you...?

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: By collecting four stones,@I can control and rule over the [textYellow:Kimochi].
That's the strong feeling I'm getting.

group_1.textLeft: For sure.
Feels like we're startin'a get a firm grip@on the [textYellow:Kimochi].

group_1.textRight: And we can feel a little reaction coming from the Automatic Purification System.
*Giggle*@Kyubey created this whole conflict,
but it looks like he wasn't lying...
when he said the Automatic Purification System@can be taken away～
In the end, we may have to fight the [textYellow:Kimochi],
but that doesn't mean there's any reason to stop@the fighting.
In fact, with Iroha Tamaki and Felicia Mitsuki's@[textYellow:Kimochi] stones gathered here,
it seems more convenient to take them all@and go home...heh heh.

group_1.textLeft: They could take your body and corrode your heart...

group_1.textRight: If overcoming the [textYellow:Kimochi] is the only way@to take control over them,
then you're not wrong in theory.
Now, Iroha Tamaki,@hand over your [textYellow:Kimochi] stone...

group_1.textLeft: You have a time limit.

group_1.textRight: Stop bluffing.@We can fight to our heart's content here.

group_1.textLeft: Assuming this ends up being a fight to the death,@you're being given an opportunity to retreat.
Gas is going to start leaking out soon@and coming through the vents.
It won't explode, but it's only a matter of time@before people start showing up.
I know in the back of your mind, you're flustered@about having your shortcut destroyed,
but right now, there is no reason to rush.

group_1.textRight: ...You never know what a wounded tiger will do.

group_1.textLeft: Then you understand the situation.
